blogPost.excerpt: A connected Notion Workspace, for your Goals, Projects & Tasks, that keeps itself organized, with Smart Notion filters, Formulas & Automations that help prevent "Notion Workspace Bankruptcy."
blogPost.body: A connected Notion Workspace, for your Goals, Projects & Tasks, that keeps itself organized, with Smart Notion filters, Formulas & Automations that help prevent "Notion Workspace Bankruptcy."
blogPost.title: 2021 Planner for Notion - Notion workspace for your goals, projects & tasks
blogPost.author: Felix

localize.description: 一个连接的Notion工作空间，为您的目标、项目和任务，保持自己的组织，与智能Notion过滤器、公式和自动化，帮助防止 "Notion工作空间破产"。
localize.tagline: 为您的目标、项目和任务提供Notion工作空间。

localize.description: 一個連接的Notion工作空間，爲您的目標、項目和任務，保持自己的組織，與智能Notion過濾器、公式和自動化，幫助防止 "Notion工作空間破產"。
localize.tagline: 爲您的目標、項目和任務提供Notion工作空間。

previous.excerpt: Binaryx introduces a new cryptocurrency token especially designed for St. Valentine's Day. Use SVDT tokens to memorize your names and Valentine’s day wishes 👩‍❤️‍👨 Also, get a chance to win travel to Dubai, Apple Watch 6, Apple AirPods Pro and more 💰
previous.title: St. Valentine's Day Token - Memorize your names and Valentine’s Day wishes

localize.description: Binaryx推出一款新的加密货币代币，特别为圣情人节设计。使用SVDT代币记住你的名字和情人节祝福❤️👨同时，还有机会赢得迪拜旅游、Apple Watch 6、Apple AirPods Pro等💰。
localize.tagline: 记下你的名字和情人节的愿望

localize.description: Binaryx推出一款新的加密貨幣代幣，特別爲聖情人節設計。使用SVDT代幣記住你的名字和情人節祝福❤️👨同時，還有機會贏得迪拜旅遊、Apple Watch 6、Apple AirPods Pro等💰。
localize.tagline: 記下你的名字和情人節的願望

next.excerpt: You can convert your text to an image for posting on IG or...! It also supports HTML and you can customize it as you LIKE!
